CustomField.formula: IF(Primary__c = true, "Marked as primary: " + TEXT(DATEVALUE(Marked_as_primary__c)) + BR(), "not marked as primary" + BR()) + IF( ( CASESAFEID(RecordTypeId ) = $Setup.CustomerObjectivesRecordTypes__c.Account_Customer_Objective__c && Primary__c = true), "Success Check On: " + TEXT(Success_Check_On__c) + BR(), "not Success Check relevant" + BR()) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Completed"), "Completed On: " + TEXT( DATEVALUE(Completed_On__c) ), "not yet completed")
CustomField.label: Objective Dates
